root: ^A lot of the kids used to swim at the river.
^They used to jump on this bridge.
^I never got the courage to do it, though.
^There's a note here at the bridge too.
^"I asked him if it was about the election, but he said it wasn't that."
^"He told me someone's coming and he's preparing."
^"'Nothing serious,' he said. But he sure didn't act like it."
^"I don't know what it is, but everyone's a little worried here, so what can you do?"
